data.name: MeraID
data.description: In this project I started working on the mobile application's frontend using Flutter. Then I switched to the backend where all the fun happened. I have used NodeJS, Serverless Framework, and AWS Lambda for APIs. For the database solution we went with the DynamoDB a NoSQL database provided by AWS. I have also worked on the authentication of this solution, and our authentication solution was so successful that we have no fake users in our system. The auth system uses passkey protected user's private communication key to facial "rekognition" and "Indexing Faces" for later confirmation. All communication to and from the API were protected with AES-256 + RSA-2048 over HTTPs protocol, "Textract" was also utilized to scan and read information from the CNIC on the server.

data.name: Shaoor.Tech
data.description: Shaoor.tech was a pet application developed using VUE JS as an SPA(Single Page Application), for the backend services I started with ExpressJS and the switched Microsoft Azure Serverless Functions were used with MongoDB as the database solution.

data.name: Bulk PDF renamer
data.description: Not only does it rename all the pdfs but also generates an ordered list
